"Fighters were born to use knuckles.": "They're perfect for getting in close to the opponent and then unleashing devastating blows. They're also great for counterattacks after evading an attack."
"The best way to learn how to use them is to dive in headfirst."
"Actually, I have some extra Knuckles right here. Go out and practice with them, then come see me when you're done."

"Let's take a look at the basic knuckle attacks and photon arts.  Although you must get in closer than with any other weapon, putting you at great risk, its combination attacks give your opponent little chance to counterattack, enabling you to dominate one-on-one battles."
